data.eml:eml: Redescription of Palaemon antennarius H. Milne Edwards, 1837 and Palaemon migratorius (Heller, 1862) (Crustacea, Decapoda, Palaemonidae) and description of two new species of the genus from the circum-Mediterranean area

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tzomos, Theodoros, Koukouras, Athanasios (2015): Redescription of Palaemon antennarius H. Milne Edwards, 1837 and Palaemon migratorius (Heller, 1862) (Crustacea, Decapoda, Palaemonidae) and description of two new species of the genus from the circum-Mediterranean area. Zootaxa 3905 (1): 27-51, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3905.1.2
